2:
Yahweh, examine what I have done and test me;\q2 thoroughly evaluate what I think in my inner being.
\q1
3:
I never forget that you are true to your covenant and faithfully love me;\q2 I conduct my life according to your faithfulness.


\q1
4:
I do not spend my time with liars,\q2 and I stay away from hypocrites.
\q1
5:
I do not like to be with evil people,\q2 and I avoid wicked people.


\q1
6:
Yahweh, I wash my hands to show that I am innocent.\q1 As I join with others marching around your altar,
\q1
7:
we sing songs to thank you,\q2 and we tell others the wonderful things that you have done.
\q1
8:
Yahweh, I love to be in the house where you live,\q2 in the place where your glory appears.



\q1
9:
Do not get rid of me like you get rid of sinners;\q2 do not cause me to die like you cause those who murder people to die,
\q1
10:
people who are ready to do wicked things\q2 and those who are always taking bribes.


\q1
11:
But as for me, I always try to do what is right.\q2 So act kindly toward me and rescue me.
\q1
12: I stand in places where I am safe,\q2 and when all your people gather together, I praise you.
